description: A classic, all-around polyester baselayer made with 100% recycled content. The smooth, soft face makes for easy layering. Hollow-core yarns and a diamond-grid back trap warm air, wick moisture and dry fast. HeiQ® Fresh durable odor control keeps things fresh.
name: Patagonia Capilene Midweight Zip Neck - Mens

specs.value: 100% recycled polyester diamond-grid double knit with HeiQ® Pure odor control
